Content: With this guide, gamers can augment their game play. Complete walkthroughs and all the maps help players navigate the game. Character descriptions, and complete lists of items, monsters and magic are included.
Presents information on game basics, characters, missions, weapons, vehicles, and strategy.

Provides poker strategies for every phase of tournament play, covering the early phase where the stakes are small to later tactics such as bluffing, flops, scare cards, playing shorthanded, loose games, and endgame play.
Critical essays accompany the story of Puritan life and the workings of the conscience on the human heart
